description:
Here at The Pelypenko Law Firm, P.C., in Atlanta, Georgia, we are fully committed to helping you make your life whole again following a catastrophic accident or some other act of negligence that resulted in a serious injury or an untimely loss to you or a member of your family.

Established in 1992, our law firm has served the residents of the greater Atlanta metro region and surrounding areas of Georgia for more than 28 years. During this time, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients who have personal injury or wrongful death claims arising from any of the following:

·Medical malpractice

·Trucking accidents

·Nursing home abuse and neglect

·Misfiled prescriptions

·Traumatic brain injuries

·Spinal cord injuries

·Unsafe property conditions

·Other preventable tragedies

Our law firm's founder, attorney Elizabeth Pelypenko, established our practice with a mission to deliver the highest level of advocacy and support to innocent accident victims and their families. Regarded as one of our region's leading personal injury lawyers, she has earned an AV-Preeminent peer review rating* from Martindale-Hubbell and a listing in Marquis' Who's Who of American Women as well as many other consistent top rankings and endorsements from her peers.

As proud as we are of our accolades, our true measure of success comes from how we treat our clients, and we have received Superb client ratings on Avvo along with a membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum as the result of our success helping our clients obtain the maximum amount of compensation for their damages as well as their pain and suffering.

To find out more about how we can best serve you and your loved ones, you can contact The Pelypenko Law Firm, P.C., by phone or through our website to receive a free evaluation of your claim. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your family safe in today's uncertain environment.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
